query:
ALTER TABLE alert_rules 
MODIFY COLUMN rule_type ENUM(
  'saudization_rate',
  'time_to_hire',
  'cost_per_hire',
  'quality_of_hire',
  'consecutive_decline',
  'threshold_breach',
  'custom'
) NOT NULL;
